org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.mediation

Interface SwiftSupport


  • public interface SwiftSupport
    Mediation support for SWIFT MT message related meditations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFieldValue(Message msg, java.lang.String field)
      Gets the value of the given field or null if that field is not found.
      java.lang.String[] getFieldValues(Message msg, java.lang.String field)
      Gets all values for a given field.
      void validateMessage(Message msg, boolean networkRulesEnable)
      Validates the original Swift MT message in the payload including its headers.
      boolean validateMessageBlock4(java.lang.String block4, int messageType, boolean enableNetworkRulesValidation)
      Method which validates only the block 4 of a Swift MT message.
      void validateMessageWithType(Message msg, boolean networkRulesEnable, int messageType)
      Validates the original Swift MT message in the payload including its headers.

    • Method Detail

      • validateMessage

        void validateMessage(Message msg,
                   boolean networkRulesEnable)
        Validates the original Swift MT message in the payload including its headers.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message passing through the UltraESB which contains a org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.format.SwiftMTMessage as its payload.
        networkRulesEnable - boolean which indicates whether NetworkRulesValidation should be carried out or not for the swift message.
        Throws:
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.ValidationError - When message validation is failed due to syntax or semantic error
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.network.NetworkRulesViolation - When message validation is failed due to a network rules violation of the message type (only when network rules validation is enabled)

      • validateMessageWithType

        void validateMessageWithType(Message msg,
                           boolean networkRulesEnable,
                           int messageType)
        Validates the original Swift MT message in the payload including its headers. The messageType is compared with the type specified in block 2 of the message and if those two are the same further validation is carried out.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message passing through the UltraESB which contains a org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.format.SwiftMTMessage as a its payload.
        networkRulesEnable - boolean which indicates whether NetworkRulesValidation should be carried out or not for the swift message.
        messageType - Type of the Swift message. e.g: 100, 564, 103
        Throws:
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.ValidationError - When message validation is failed due to syntax or semantic error
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.network.NetworkRulesViolation - When message validation is failed due to a network rules violation of the message type (only when network rules validation is enabled)

      • validateMessageBlock4

        boolean validateMessageBlock4(java.lang.String block4,
                            int messageType,
                            boolean enableNetworkRulesValidation)
        Method which validates only the block 4 of a Swift MT message.
        Parameters:
        block4 - a String which contains the block 4 of a Swift MT message.
        messageType - Type of the Swift message. e.g: 100, 564, 103
        enableNetworkRulesValidation - boolean which indicates whether NetworkRulesValidation should be carried out or not for the swift message.
        Returns:
        true if the the message validation is successful.
        Throws:
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.ValidationError - When block 4 validation is failed due to syntax or semantic error
        org.adroitlogic.utraswift.validation.network.NetworkRulesViolation - When block 4 validation is failed due to a network rules violation of the message type (only when network rules validation is enabled)

      • getFieldValue

        java.lang.String getFieldValue(Message msg,
                             java.lang.String field)
        Gets the value of the given field or null if that field is not found. NOTE: if the field is present more than once, then this method retrieves the value of the first occurrence
        Parameters:
        msg - Message passing through the UltraESB which contains the org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.format.SwiftMTMessage as its payload
        field - a String which contains the name of a field (case sensitive) within the block 4 of a swift message. e.g: 97A, 13B, 35B
        Returns:
        a String containing the value, null if the field is not set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter field is null

      • getFieldValues

        java.lang.String[] getFieldValues(Message msg,
                                java.lang.String field)
        Gets all values for a given field. The field list is searched in order, all field values matching the field name are added to the resulting array. NOTE: the resulting array may be empty if no field is matched.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message passing through the UltraESB which contains the org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.format.SwiftMTMessage as its payload.
        field - a String which contains the name of a field (case sensitive) within the block 4 of a swift message. e.g: 97A, 13B, 35B
        Returns:
        an array containing the values of all the occurrences of the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter field is null
